author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Stir together all the pesto ingredients. Add the gnocchi and stir to coat. Sprinkle over more parmesan and serve.
ingredients: Â½ packet gnocchi, cooked,  handful of rocket, finely chopped,  1 lemon, zest and juice only,  5-6 tbsp olive oil,  55g/2oz parmesan, finely grated
